trans-unit.source: The precision configuration setting determines how much timestamp precision is retained in the points received from input plugins. All incoming timestamps are truncated to the given precision. Telegraf then pads the truncated timestamps with zeros to create a nanosecond timestamp; output plugins will emit timestamps in nanoseconds. Valid precisions are ns, us or µs, ms, and s.
trans-unit.target: 精度配置设置确定从输入插件接收的点中保留多少时间戳精度。所有传入的时间戳都将被截断为给定的精度。然后，Telegraf用零填充被截断的时间戳，以创建一个纳秒级的时间戳；输出插件将发出以纳秒为单位的时间戳。有效精度为 ns ， us 或 µs ， ms 和 s 。

trans-unit.source: The precision to use when writing the data.
trans-unit.target: 写入数据时使用的精度。

trans-unit.source: The preferred measurement of the rate at which data are persisted to InfluxDB. Write speeds are generally quoted in values per second.
trans-unit.target: 衡量数据持久化到InfluxDB的速度的首选方法。写入速度一般以每秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The process listens on a unix domain socket.
trans-unit.target: 该进程在unix域套接字上监听。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the time series data use case make it challenging for many existing storage engines. Over the course of InfluxDB’s development we’ve tried a few of the more popular options. We started with LevelDB, an engine based on LSM Trees, which are optimized for write throughput. After that we tried BoltDB, an engine based on a memory mapped B+Tree, which is optimized for reads. Finally, we ended up building our own storage engine that is similar in many ways to LSM Trees.
trans-unit.target: 时间序列数据用例的属性使其对许多现有存储引擎具有挑战性。在InfluxDB的开发过程中，我们尝试了一些较流行的选项。我们从LevelDB开始，LevelDB是基于LSM树的引擎，针对写吞吐量进行了优化。之后，我们尝试了BoltDB，这是一种基于内存映射的B + Tree的引擎，该引擎针对读取进行了优化。最后，我们最终构建了自己的存储引擎，该存储引擎在许多方面都与LSM树相似。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this step is to generate enough load on your system to trigger an alert. More specifically, your idle CPU usage must dip below 80%. On the machine that’s running Telegraf, enter the following command in the terminal to start some while loops:
trans-unit.target: 此步骤的目的是在系统上生成足够的负载以触发警报。更具体地说，您的空闲CPU使用率必须降至 80% 以下。在运行Telegraf的机器上，在终端中输入以下命令以启动 while 循环：

trans-unit.source: The purpose-built data storage format for InfluxDB. TSM allows for greater compaction and higher write and read throughput than existing B+ or LSM tree implementations. See Storage Engine for more.
trans-unit.target: InfluxDB的专用数据存储格式。与现有的B +或LSM树实现相比，TSM允许更大的压缩以及更大的读写吞吐量。有关更多信息，请参见Storage Engine。

trans-unit.source: The queries return the timestamp for the maximum point that appears in the raw data.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回出现在原始数据中的最大点的时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The query aggregates data using an InfluxQL function and a GROUP BY time() clause. It aggregates data in every measurement that matches the regular expression in the FROM clause and writes the results to measurements with the same name in the where_else database and the autogen retention policy. Note that both where_else and autogen must exist prior to running the INTO query. See Database Management for how to manage databases and retention policies.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和 GROUP BY time() 子句聚合数据。它在与 FROM 子句中的正则表达式匹配的每个度量中聚合数据，并将结果写入 where_else 数据库和 autogen 保留策略中具有相同名称的度量中。请注意，在运行 INTO 查询之前， where_else 和 autogen 都必须存在。有关如何管理数据库和保留策略，请参见数据库管理。

trans-unit.source: The query aggregates data using an InfluxQL function and a GROUP BY time() clause. It also writes its results to the all_my_averages measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和 GROUP BY time() 子句聚合数据。还将其结果写入 all_my_averages 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query below asks for the greatest field values of water_level for three tag values of the location tag key. Because the location tag key has two tag values (santa_monica and coyote_creek), the query returns two points instead of three.
trans-unit.target: 下面的查询要求 water_level 的最大字段值是 location 标签键的三个标签值。因为 location 标记键具有两个标记值（ santa_monica 和 coyote_creek ），所以查询返回的是两个点，而不是三个点。

trans-unit.source: The query below asks for the smallest field values of water_level for three tag values of the location tag key. Because the location tag key has two tag values (santa_monica and coyote_creek), the query returns two points instead of three.
trans-unit.target: 以下查询要求 location 标签键的三个标签值的 water_level 最小字段值。因为 location 标记键具有两个标记值（ santa_monica 和 coyote_creek ），所以查询返回的是两个点，而不是三个点。

trans-unit.source: The query below returns two points per 18-minute GROUP BY time() interval. Notice that the returned timestamps are the points’ original timestamps; they are not forced to match the start of the GROUP BY time() intervals.
trans-unit.target: 以下查询每18分钟的 GROUP BY time() 间隔返回2分。请注意，返回的时间戳是点的原始时间戳；它们不会被强制匹配 GROUP BY time() 间隔的开始。

trans-unit.source: The query below returns two randomly selected points per 18-minute GROUP BY time() interval. Notice that the returned timestamps are the points’ original timestamps; they are not forced to match the start of the GROUP BY time() intervals.
trans-unit.target: 下面的查询每隔18分钟的 GROUP BY time() 间隔返回两个随机选择的点。请注意，返回的时间戳是点的原始时间戳。它们不被强制匹配 GROUP BY time() 间隔的开始。

trans-unit.source: The query creates a database called NOAA_water_database. By default, InfluxDB also creates the autogen retention policy and associates it with the NOAA_water_database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将创建一个名为 NOAA_water_database 的数据库。默认情况下，InfluxDB还创建 autogen 保留策略，并将其与关联 NOAA_water_database 。

trans-unit.source: The query creates a database called NOAA_water_database. It also creates a default retention policy for NOAA_water_database with a DURATION of three days, a replication factor of one, a shard group duration of one hour, and with the name liquid.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将创建一个名为 NOAA_water_database 的数据库。这也创造了一个默认的保留策略 NOAA_water_database 有 DURATION 的三天，一个复制的因素之一，一个碎片组一小时的持续时间，并与名称 liquid 。

trans-unit.source: The query creates a retention policy called one_day_only for the database NOAA_water_database with a one day duration and a replication factor of one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询为数据库 NOAA_water_database 创建一个名为 one_day_only 的保留策略，该保留策略的持续时间为一天，复制因子为一。

trans-unit.source: The query creates the same retention policy as the one in the example above, but sets it as the default retention policy for the database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询创建了与上面例子中相同的保留策略,但将其设置为数据库的默认保留策略。

trans-unit.source: The query engine then determines the shards that match the SELECT statement’s time range. From these shards, iterators are created for each field in the statement.
trans-unit.target: 然后，查询引擎将确定与 SELECT 语句的时间范围匹配的分片。根据这些分片，为语句中的每个字段创建迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The query engine will have additive changes over the course of the new releases. We’ll introduce new query functions and new functionality into the language without breaking backwards compatibility. We may introduce new protocol endpoints (like a binary format) and versions of the line protocol and query API to improve performance and/or functionality, but they will have to run in parallel with the existing versions. Existing versions will be supported for the entirety of the 1.x release line.
trans-unit.target: 查询引擎将在新版本的过程中进行附加更改。我们将在语言中引入新的查询功能和新功能，而不会破坏向后兼容性。我们可能会引入新的协议端点（如二进制格式）以及行协议和查询API的版本，以提高性能和/或功能，但它们必须与现有版本并行运行。1.x发行版的整个版本将支持现有版本。

trans-unit.source: The query is an example of downsampling with backreferencing. It takes higher precision data from more than one measurement, aggregates those data to a lower precision, and stores the lower precision data in the database. Downsampling with backreferencing is a common use case for the INTO clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询是使用反向引用进行下采样的示例。它从多个测量中获取更高精度的数据，将这些数据汇总为较低的精度，然后将较低精度的数据存储在数据库中。使用反向引用进行下采样是 INTO 子句的常见用例。

trans-unit.source: The query is an example of downsampling: taking higher precision data, aggregating those data to a lower precision, and storing the lower precision data in the database. Downsampling is a common use case for the INTO clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询是下采样的一个示例：获取较高精度的数据，将这些数据聚合到较低精度，然后将较低精度的数据存储在数据库中。下采样是 INTO 子句的常见用例。

trans-unit.source: The query language has been extended with a few new features:
trans-unit.target: 查询语言已经扩展了一些新功能。

trans-unit.source: The query log enabled setting toggles the logging of parsed queries before execution. Very useful for troubleshooting, but will log any sensitive data contained within a query.
trans-unit.target: 启用查询日志的设置可以在执行之前切换解析查询的日志。对于故障排除非常有用,但会记录查询中包含的任何敏感数据。

trans-unit.source: The query multiplies water_level’s field values by two and adds four to those values. Note that InfluxDB follows the standard order of operations. See Mathematical Operators for more on supported operators.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将 water_level 的字段值乘以2，然后将这些值加4。请注意，InfluxDB遵循标准的操作顺序。有关支持的运算符的更多信息，请参见数学运算符。

trans-unit.source: The query results include the UTC offset (-05:00) for the America/Chicago time zone in the timestamps.
trans-unit.target: 查询结果包括时间戳中 America/Chicago 时区的UTC偏移量（ -05:00 ）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns InfluxDB’s null timestamp equivalent (epoch 0: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) as the timestamp. SUM() aggregates points across several timestamps and has no single timestamp to return.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回InfluxDB的null时间戳等效值（epoch 0： 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z ）作为时间戳。 SUM() 跨多个时间戳聚合点，并且没有要返回的单个时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The query returns InfluxDB’s null timestamp equivalent (epoch 0: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z) as the timestamp. The MAX() and MIN() functions return different timestamps so the system has no single timestamp to return.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回InfluxDB的null时间戳等效值（epoch 0： 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z ）作为时间戳。该 MAX() 和 MIN() 函数返回不同的时间戳，以该系统没有单个时间戳返回。

trans-unit.source: The query returns a tabular list of the unique field values for each field key in the h2o_feet measurement that contains the word description.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 度量中每个字段关键字的唯一字段值的表格列表，其中包含单词 description 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns a tabular list of the unique field values for each field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 测量中每个字段键的唯一字段值的表格列表。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns a tabular list of the unique field values in the level description field key in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 h2o_feet 测量值的 level description 字段键中返回唯一字段值的表格列表。

trans-unit.source: The query returns a tabular list of the unique field values in the level description field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query also limits the number of series returned to one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 level description 字段键中返回唯一字段值的表格列表。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询还将返回的序列数限制为一个。

trans-unit.source: The query returns all water_levelpoints from one of the series associated with the h2o_feetmeasurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 h2o_feet 度量值关联的系列之一中的所有 water_level 点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns all mean values of the water_level field that are greater than five.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段的所有均值大于5。

trans-unit.source: The query returns all measurements in the NOAA_water_database that start with h2o and have values for the tag key randtag that include an integer.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将返回 NOAA_water_database 中所有以 h2o 开头并具有包含整数的标签键 randtag 的值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns all series in the NOAA_water_database database that are associated with the h2o_quality measurement and the tag location = coyote_creek. The LIMIT clause limits the number of series returned to two.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中与 h2o_quality 测量值和标记 location = coyote_creek 相关联的所有序列。该 LIMIT 子句限制返回两个系列的数量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns all tag values of the randtag tag key in the NOAA_water_database database. SHOW TAG VALUES groups query results by measurement name.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中 randtag 标记键的所有标记值。 SHOW TAG VALUES 按测量名称对查询结果进行分组。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data for the series associated with the h2o_feetmeasurement and the location = santa_monicatag. Without SOFFSET 1, the query returns data for the series associated with the h2o_feet measurement and the location = coyote_creek tag.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 h2o_feet 测量值和 location = santa_monica 标签关联的系列的数据。如果没有 SOFFSET 1 ，则查询返回与 h2o_feet 测量值和 location = coyote_creek 标记关联的系列的数据。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feet measurement that have timestamps within the past seven days. The Time Syntax section on this page offers in-depth information on supported time syntax in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 度量返回的数据具有过去7天内的时间戳。此页面上的“ 时间语法”部分在 WHERE 子句中提供了有关受支持的时间语法的深入信息。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feet measurement where the tag keylocation is set to santa_monica. InfluxQL requires single quotes around tag values in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量返回数据，其中标记键 location 设置为 santa_monica 。InfluxQL需要在 WHERE 子句中的标记值周围加上单引号。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feet measurement where the tag key location is not set to santa_monica and where the field values of water_level are either less than -0.59 or greater than 9.95. The WHERE clause supports the operators AND and OR, and supports separating logic with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 从查询返回的数据 h2o_feet 测量，其中所述标签键 location 没有被设置为 santa_monica 并且其中的字段值 water_level 要么比大于9.95小于-0.59或者。的 WHERE 子句支持运营商 AND 和 OR ，并支持与括号分开的逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feet measurement with field values of level description that equal the below 3 feet string. InfluxQL requires single quotes around string field values in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量返回的数据具有 level description 字段值，该值等于 below 3 feet 字符串。InfluxQL需要在 WHERE 子句中的字符串字段值周围加上单引号。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feet measurement with field values of water_level plus two that are greater than 11.9. Note that InfluxDB follows the standard order of operations See Mathematical Operators for more on supported operators.
trans-unit.target: 从查询返回的数据 h2o_feet 用的字段值测量 water_level 加上两个是比11.9大。请注意，InfluxDB遵循标准的操作顺序。有关支持的运算符的更多信息，请参见数学运算符。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data from the h2o_feetmeasurement with field values of water_level that are greater than eight.
trans-unit.target: 从查询返回的数据 h2o_feet 测量与字段值的 water_level 是大于八。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps between August 18, 2015 at 00:00:00 and August 18, 2015 at 00:12:00. The first date-time string does not include a time; InfluxDB assumes the time is 00:00:00.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的数据时间戳在2015年8月18日00:00:00至2015年8月18日00:12:00之间。第一个日期-时间字符串不包含时间,InfluxDB假设时间为00:00:00。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps between August 18, 2015 at 00:00:00.000000000 and August 18, 2015 at 00:12:00. The nanosecond specification in the first timestamp (.000000000) is optional.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回时间戳为2015年8月18日00：00：00.000000000到2015年8月18日00:12:00之间的数据。第一个时间戳（ .000000000 ）中的纳秒级规范是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur at least six minutes after September 18, 2015 at 21:24:00. Note that the whitespace between the + and 6m is required.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的时间戳记的数据至少在2015年9月18日21:24:00之后六分钟出现。请注意， + 和 6m 之间的空格是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur at least six minutes before September 18, 2015 at 21:24:00. Note that the whitespace between the - and 6m is required.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的时间戳数据至少在2015年9月18日21:24:00之前六分钟出现。请注意， - 和 6m 之间的空格是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur between August 18, 2015 at 00:00:00 and August 18, 2015 at 00:12:00. By default InfluxDB assumes epoch timestamps are in nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的数据时间戳发生在2015年8月18日00:00:00和2015年8月18日00:12:00之间。默认情况下,InfluxDB假设时间戳的单位是纳秒。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur between August 18, 2015 at 00:00:00 and August 18, 2015 at 00:12:00. The sduration literal at the end of the epoch timestamps indicate that the epoch timestamps are in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的时间戳记的数据在2015年8月18日00:00:00到2015年8月18日00:12:00之间。纪元时间戳记末尾的 s 持续时间文字表示纪元时间戳记以秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur between September 18, 2015 at 21:18:00 and 1000 days from now(). The whitespace between + and 1000d is required.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回带有时间戳的数据，该时间戳发生在2015年9月18日21:18:00到 now() 之后的 1000天之间。 + 和 1000d 之间的空格是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns data with timestamps that occur within the past hour. The whitespace between - and 1h is required.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的数据带有过去一小时内的时间戳。 - 和 1h 之间的空格是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns database names in a tabular format. This InfluxDB instance has two databases: NOAA_water_database and _internal.
trans-unit.target: 该查询以表格格式返回数据库名称。这个InfluxDB实例有两个数据库： NOAA_water_database 和 _internal 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns no data as casting a float field value to a string is not yet supported.
trans-unit.target: 查询不返回任何数据,因为还不支持将float字段值转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The query returns one randomly selected point from the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z and groups results into 18-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 water_level 字段键返回一个随机选择的点。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 和基团的结果到18分钟的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The query returns tag keys from the h2o_quality measurement in the NOAA_water_database database. The LIMIT and OFFSET clauses limit the number of tag keys returned to one and offsets the results by one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 NOAA_water_database 数据库中的 h2o_quality 度量返回标签键。该 LIMIT 和 OFFSET 子句限制返回到一个标签键和偏移的结果通过一个数。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the 12-minute rate of change between averagewater_levels that are calculated at 12-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回以12分钟为间隔计算的平均 water_level s之间的12分钟变化率。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average and median field values in the water_level field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回平均值和中位数字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average field value of the water_level field key and renames the output field key to dream_name. Without the AS clause, the query returns mean as the output field key:
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键的平均字段值，并将输出字段键重命名为 dream_name 。如果没有 AS 子句，则查询返回 mean 作为输出字段键：

trans-unit.source: The query returns the median and mode field values for the water_level field key and renames the output field keys to med_wat and mode_wat. Without the AS clauses, the query returns median and mode as the output field keys:
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键的中值和模式字段值，并将输出字段键重命名为 med_wat 和 mode_wat 。如果没有 AS 子句，该查询返回 median 和 mode 作为输出领域键：

trans-unit.source: The query returns the minimum and maximum field values in the water_level field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回最小和最大字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the mode field values for the water_level field key and for the level description field key. The water_level mode is in the mode column and the level description mode is in the mode_1 column. The system can’t return more than one column with the same name so it renames the second mode column to mode_1.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段关键字和 level description 字段关键字的模式字段值。该 water_level 模式为 mode 列和 level description 模式处于 mode_1 柱。系统不能返回多个具有相同名称的列，因此它将第二个 mode 列重命名为 mode_1 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the area under the curve (in minutes) for the field values associated with each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has on numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回曲线下的区域（以分钟为单位），该区域与与每个字段键关联的字段值存储在 h2o_feet 测量值中。该 h2o_feet 测量对数值字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the area under the curve (in minutes) for the field values associated with each field key that stores numerical values includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回曲线下的面积（以分钟为单位），该面积与与存储数值的每个字段键相关联的字段值包括在 h2o_feet 测量中的单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the area under the curve (in minutes) for the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将返回曲线下的面积（以分钟为单位），该面积是与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值以及在 h2o_feet 测量值中的。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the area under the curve (in minutes) for the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z, groups results into 12-minute intervals, and limits the number of results returned to one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将返回曲线下的面积（以分钟为单位），该面积是与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值以及在 h2o_feet 测量值中的。它涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 之间的时间范围，将结果分为12分钟间隔，并将结果数限制为一个。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the area under the curve (in seconds) for the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值和 h2o_feet 测量值的曲线下面积（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average field value for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的平均字段值，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average field value for every field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段关键字的平均字段值，该字段关键字在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average field value in the water_level field key in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 h2o_feet 测量值的 water_level 字段键中返回平均字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average of the differences between the number of cats and dogs in the pet_daycare measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的平均数量之间的差异 cats 与 dogs 在 pet_daycare 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the average of the values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 9.01 and limits the number of points and series returned to seven and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中值的平均值。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。查询填补空的时间间隔与 9.01 和限制回到七又点和系列号。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference (in milliseconds) between subsequent timestamps in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z and sorts timestamps in descending order. The query also limits the number of points returned to one and offsets results by one point.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中后续时间戳之间的差（以毫秒为单位）。它涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z 之间的时间范围，并按降序对时间戳进行排序。该查询还将返回的点数限制为1，并使结果偏移 1点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference (in minutes) between subsequent timestamps associated with each field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 h2o_feet 测量中的每个字段键关联的后续时间戳之间的差异（以分钟为单位）。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference (in minutes) between subsequent timestamps in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中后续时间戳之间的差（以分钟为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference (in nanoseconds) between subsequent timestamps in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中后续时间戳之间的差异（以纳秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference (in seconds) between subsequent timestamps associated with each field key that includes the word level in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与包括该单词的每个字段键相关联的后续的时间戳之间的差值（单位为秒） level 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between maximumwater_levels that are calculated at 12-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回以12分钟为间隔计算的最大 water_level s之间的差。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the minimum and maximum field values for every field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的最小和最大字段值之间的差，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the minimum and maximum field values for every field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的最小和最大字段值之间的差，每个字段键在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the minimum and maximum field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中的最小和最大字段值之间的差。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the minimum and maximum field values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Zand groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 18, limits the number of points and series returned to three and one, and offsets the series returned by one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中最小和最大字段值之间的差。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用 18 填充空的时间间隔，将返回的点和序列的数量限制为3和1，并将返回的序列偏移 1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the subsequent field values for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的后续字段值之间的差，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the subsequent field values for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回每个字段关键字的后续字段值之间的差，每个字段关键字在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the subsequent field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 度量值中后续字段值之间的差。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the difference between the subsequent field values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z and returns results in descending timestamp order. They query also limits the number of points returned to two and offsets results by two points.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中后续字段值之间的差。它涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 之间的时间范围，并以时间戳记降序返回结果。他们查询还将返回的点数限制为两点，并将结果偏移两点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field keys and field value data types for each measurement in the NOAA_water_database database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中每个度量的字段键和字段值数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field value that is larger than 20 percent of the values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 24-minute intervals. It fills empty time intervals with 15 and it limits the number of points returned to two.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的字段值大于 water_level 字段键中值的20％。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果为24分钟的间隔。它用 15 填充空的时间间隔，并将返回的点数限制为2。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field value that is larger than five percent of the field values in each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的字段值大于每个字段键中的字段值的百分之五，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field value that is larger than five percent of the field values in each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的字段值大于每个在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值的字段键中的字段值的百分之五。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field value that is larger than five percent of the field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的字段值大于 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 度量值中字段值的百分之五。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the field value that is larger than five percent of the field values in the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the level description field key.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回的字段值大于 water_level 字段键以及 location 标签键和 level description 字段键的相关值的百分之五的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the fields keys and field value data types for the h2o_feet measurement in the NOAA_water_database database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中 h2o_feet 测量的字段键和字段值数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the fourth, fifth, and sixth points from the h2o_feetmeasurement. If the query did not include OFFSET 3, it would return the first, second, and third points from that measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量返回第四，第五和第六点。如果查询不包含 OFFSET 3 ，它将返回该测量的第一，第二和第三点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field value for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的最大字段值，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field value for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将为每个字段键返回最大字段值，该字段键在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field value in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中返回最大字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field value in the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the level description field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中的最大字段值以及 location 标签键和 level description 字段键的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field value in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results in to 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 9.01, and it limits the number of points and series returned to four and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回最大字段值。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团中，以12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签的结果。该查询用 9.01 填充空的时间间隔，并将返回的点和级数限制为4和1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest field values in the water_level field key for two tag values associated with the location tag key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回与 location 标签键关联的两个标签值的最大字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest four field values in the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the level description field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中最大的四个字段值以及 location 标签键和 level description 字段键的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest three field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feetmeasurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中返回最大的三个字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the greatest three values in the water_level field key for each 24-minute interval between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z. It also returns results in descending timestamp order.
trans-unit.target: 对于 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 之间的每24分钟间隔，查询将在 water_level 字段键中返回最大的三个值。它还以时间戳记降序返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the integer form of water_level’s float field values.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 的float 字段值的整数形式。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the list of measurements in the NOAA_water_database database. The database has five measurements: average_temperature, h2o_feet, h2o_pH, h2o_quality, and h2o_temperature.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中的测量值列表。该数据库具有五个度量值： average_temperature ， h2o_feet ， h2o_pH ， h2o_quality 和 h2o_temperature 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the list of retention policies in the NOAA_water_database database in tabular format. The database has one retention policy called autogen. The autogen retention policy has an infinite duration, a seven-day shard group duration, a replication factor of one, and it is the DEFAULT retention policy for the database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询以表格格式返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中的保留策略列表。该数据库具有一种称为 autogen 的保留策略。该 autogen 保留策略具有无限持续时间，为期七天的碎片群持续时间，一个复制的因素之一，它是 DEFAULT 数据库保留策略。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the list of tag keys in the NOAA_water_database database. The output groups tag keys by measurement name; it shows that every measurement has the location tag key and that the h2o_quality measurement has an additional randtag tag key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中的标记键列表。输出按测量名称对标签键进行分组；它表明每个度量都有 location 标记键，而 h2o_quality 度量具有附加的 randtag 标记键。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lower time bound (WHERE time >= '2015-08-18T00:00:00Z') as the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回下限时间（ WHERE time >= '2015-08-18T00:00:00Z' ）作为时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lower time bound for each GROUP BY time() interval as the timestamps.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个 GROUP BY time() 间隔的下限时间作为时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lower time bound for each GROUP BY time() interval as the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个 GROUP BY time() 间隔的下限时间作为时间戳。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lowest field value for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的最低字段值，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包含单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lowest field value for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的最低字段值，该最低字段值在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lowest field value in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中的最低字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lowest field value in the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the level description field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中的最低字段值以及 location 标签键和 level description 字段键的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the lowest field value in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results in to 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 9.01, and it limits the number of points and series returned to four and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中的最低字段值。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团中，以12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签的结果。该查询用 9.01 填充空的时间间隔，并将返回的点和级数限制为4和1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the measurements in the NOAA_water_database database that start with h2o. The LIMIT and OFFSET clauses limit the number of measurement names returned to two and offset the results by one, skipping the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 NOAA_water_database 数据库中返回以 h2o 开头的度量。该 LIMIT 和 OFFSET 子句限制返回到两个测量名称的数目，并通过一个抵消的结果，跳过 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the middle field value for every field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将为每个字段键返回中间字段值，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包含单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the middle field value for every field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的中间字段值，该字段键在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the middle field value in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中返回中间字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the middle field value in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 700, limits the number of points and series returned to seven and one, and offsets the series returned by one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回中间字段值。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用 700 填充空时间间隔，将返回的点和序列数限制为7和1，并用1 偏移返回的序列。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the mode of the values associated with the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query limits the number of points and series returned to three and one, and it offsets the series returned by one.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的值的模式。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询将返回的点和序列数限制为3和1，并且将返回的序列偏移 1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the most frequent field value for every field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 测量中每个字段键的最频繁字段值。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the most frequent field value for every field key that includes the word /water/ in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回包括单词每场关键最频繁的字段值 /water/ 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the most frequent field value in the level description field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 level description 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量中返回最频繁的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the newest field value (determined by timestamp) associated with the level description field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 level description 字段键相关联的最新字段值（由时间戳确定），并在 h2o_feet 测量中。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the newest field value (determined by timestamp) for each field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 度量中每个字段键的最新字段值（由时间戳确定）。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the newest field value (determined by timestamp) in the level description field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the water_level field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 level description 字段关键字中的最新字段值（由时间戳确定）以及 location 标签关键字和 water_level 字段关键字的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the newest field value (determined by timestamp) in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 9.01, and it limits the number of points and series returned to four and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回最新的字段值（由时间戳确定）。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用 9.01 填充空的时间间隔，并将返回的点和级数限制为4和1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the newest field value for each field key that includes the word level in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回该包括单词的每个字段键的最新字段值 level 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of non-null field values for each field key associated with the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回与 h2o_feet 度量值关联的每个字段键的非空字段值的数量。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of non-null field values for every field key that contains the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回非空字段值的包含单词每场关键数量 water 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of non-null field values in the water_level field key in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 h2o_feet 测量值的 water_level 字段键中返回非空字段值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of non-null field values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 200 and limits the number of points and series returned to seven and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中非空字段值的数量。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。查询填补空的时间间隔与 200 和限制回到七又点和系列号。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of unique field values for the level description field key and the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 level description 字段关键字和 h2o_feet 测量值的唯一字段值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the number of unique field values in the level description field key and the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 level description 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中返回唯一字段值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the oldest field value (determined by timestamp) associated with the level description field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 level description 字段键相关联且在 h2o_feet 测量中的最旧的字段值（由时间戳确定）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the oldest field value (determined by timestamp) for each field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 测量中每个字段键的最旧字段值（由时间戳确定）。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the oldest field value (determined by timestamp) in the level description field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the water_level field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 level description 字段键中最旧的字段值（由时间戳确定）以及 location 标签键和 water_level 字段键的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the oldest field value (determined by timestamp) in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 9.01, and it limits the number of points and series returned to four and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键中返回最旧的字段值（由时间戳确定）。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用 9.01 填充空的时间间隔，并将返回的点和级数限制为4和1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the oldest field value for each field key that includes the word level in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回该包括单词的每个字段键的最古老的字段值 level 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the one-second rate of change between the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值和 h2o_feet 测量值之间的一秒变化率。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the one-second rate of change between the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z and returns results in descending timestamp order. The query also limits the number of points returned to one and offsets results by two points.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值和 h2o_feet 测量值之间的一秒变化率。它涵盖 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 到 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 之间的时间范围，并以降序的时间戳顺序返回结果。该查询还将返回的点数限制为一，并将结果偏移两点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the points with the most recent timestamps from the h2o_feetmeasurement first. Without ORDER by time DESC, the query would return 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z first and 2015-09-18T21:42:00Z last.
trans-unit.target: 该查询首先从 h2o_feet 测量返回具有最新时间戳的点。如果没有 ORDER by time DESC ，则查询将首先返回 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z ，最后返回 2015-09-18T21:42:00Z 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the rolling average across a four-field-value window for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word level in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将为每个字段键返回一个四字段值窗口的滚动平均值，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量中包括单词 level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the rolling average across a three-field-value window for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将为每个字段键（在 h2o_feet 测量中存储数值）返回一个三字段值窗口的滚动平均值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the rolling average across a two-field-value window for the water_level field key and the h2o_feet measurement. The first result (2.09) is the average of the first two points in the raw data: (2.064 + 2.116) / 2). The second result (2.072) is the average of the second two points in the raw data: (2.116 + 2.028) / 2).
trans-unit.target: 查询返回两个字段值窗口的滚动平均值，以显示 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值。第一个结果（ 2.09 ）是原始数据中前两个点的平均值：（ 2.064 + 2.116) / 2 。第二个结果（ 2.072 ）是原始数据中后两个点的平均值：（ 2.116 + 2.028) / 2 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the rolling average across a two-field-value window for the water_level field key in the h2o_feet measurement. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z and returns results in descending timestamp order. The query also limits the number of points returned to two and offsets results by three points.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 h2o_feet 测量值中 water_level 字段键的两个字段值窗口的滚动平均值。它涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 之间的时间范围，并以时间戳记降序返回结果。该查询还将返回的点数限制为两个，并使结果偏移三个点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the rolling average across a two-value window of maximumwater_levels that are calculated at 12-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将返回最大 water_level s 的二值窗口的滚动平均值，该值以12分钟为间隔计算。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the running total of averagewater_levels that are calculated at 12-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回以12分钟为间隔计算的平均 water_level 的运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the running total of the field values associated with the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z and returns results in descending timestamp order. The query also limits the number of points returned to four and offsets results by two points.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值的运行总计。它涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:30:00Z 之间的时间范围，并以时间戳记降序返回结果。该查询还将返回的点数限制为四个，并且将结果偏移两个点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the running total of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的字段值的运行总计，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 度量中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the running total of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的字段值的运行总计，该字段键在 h2o_feet 度量中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the running total of the field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 度量值中字段值的运行总计。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the six-minute rate of change between average water_levels that are calculated at 12-minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回以12分钟为间隔计算的平均 water_level s之间的六分钟变化率。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the six-minute rate of change between the field values associated with the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与 water_level 字段键关联的字段值与 h2o_feet 测量值之间的六分钟变化率。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the smallest field values in the water_level field key for two tag values associated with the location tag key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中与 location 标签键关联的两个标签值的最小字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the smallest four field values in the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag key and the level description field key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中最小的四个字段值以及 location 标签键和 level description 字段键的相关值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the smallest three field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feetmeasurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中返回最小的三个字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the smallest three values in the water_level field key for each 24-minute interval between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z. It also returns results in descending timestamp order.
trans-unit.target: 对于 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 之间的每24分钟间隔，该查询将在 water_level 字段键中返回最小的三个值。它还以时间戳记降序返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the standard deviation of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的字段值的标准偏差，这些字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the standard deviation of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段关键字的字段值的标准偏差，这些字段关键字在 h2o_feet 测量值中存储数值。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the standard deviation of the field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中字段值的标准偏差。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the standard deviation of the field values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 18000, limits the number of points and series returned to two and one, and offsets the series returned by one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中字段值的标准偏差。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用 18000 填充空白时间间隔，将返回的点和序列数限制为2和1，并用1 偏移返回的序列。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the sum of the derivative of average water_level values for each tag value of location.
trans-unit.target: 查询返回平均数的导数的总和 water_level 为每个变量值的值 location 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the sum of the maximum water_level values across every tag value of location.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回的最大的总和 water_level 值跨越的每一个标签值 location 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the summed total of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段键的字段值的总和，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the summed total of the field values for each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回每个字段关键字的字段值的总和，该字段关键字将数值存储在 h2o_feet 测量中。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the summed total of the field values in the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量值中字段值的总和。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the summed total of the field values in the water_level field key. It covers the time range between 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z and 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z and groups results into 12-minute time intervals and per tag. The query fills empty time intervals with 18000, and it limits the number of points and series returned to four and one.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键中字段值的总和。它覆盖的时间范围之间 2015-08-17T23:48:00Z 和 2015-08-18T00:54:00Z 和基团的结果到12分钟的时间间隔和每个标签。该查询用18000 填充空白时间间隔，并将返回的点和级数限制为4和1。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the tag values of the tag keys location and randtag for all measurements in the NOAA_water_database database where randtag has tag values. The LIMIT clause limits the number of tag values returned to three.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 NOAA_water_database 数据库中所有测量的标签键 location 和 randtag 的标签值，其中 randtag 具有标签值。该 LIMIT 子句限制标签值的数量恢复到三个。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the three oldest points (determined by timestamp) from one of the series associated with the measurementh2o_feet.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从与测量 h2o_feet 关联的系列之一中返回三个最旧的点（由时间戳确定）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the three oldest points (determined by timestamp) from the h2o_feetmeasurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量返回三个最早的点（由时间戳确定）。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the three-minute rate of change between the field values associated with each field key that stores numerical values in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has one numerical field: water_level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将返回与每个字段键（在 h2o_feet 测量中存储数值）相关联的字段值之间的三分钟变化率。该 h2o_feet 测量具有一个数字字段： water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns the two-minute rate of change between the field values associated with each field key that stores numerical values and includes the word water in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回与每个字段键关联的字段值之间的两分钟变化率，该字段键存储数值并在 h2o_feet 测量值中包括单词 water 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns two series of results: one for each tag value of the location tag. The result for each timestamp represents a single 12 minute interval. The count for the first timestamp covers the raw data between 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z and up to, but not including, 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z. The count for the second timestamp covers the raw data between 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z and up to, but not including, 2015-08-18T00:24:00Z.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回两个系列的结果：每个标签值的的 location 标记。每个时间戳记的结果代表一个12分钟的间隔。第一个时间戳记的计数涵盖 2015-08-18T00:00:00Z 到（但不包括） 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z 之间的原始数据。第二个时间戳记的计数涵盖了 2015-08-18T00:12:00Z 到 2015-08-18T00:24:00Z. （但不包括）之间的原始数据。

trans-unit.source: The query returns two randomly selected points for each field key in the h2o_feet measurement. The h2o_feet measurement has two field keys: level description and water_level.
trans-unit.target: 查询为 h2o_feet 测量中的每个字段键返回两个随机选择的点。该 h2o_feet 测量有两个字段键： level description 和 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query returns two randomly selected points for each field key that includes the word level in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回该包括单词的每个字段键两个随机选择的点 level 在 h2o_feet 测量。

trans-unit.source: The query returns two randomly selected points from the water_level field key and in the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 water_level 字段键和 h2o_feet 测量中返回两个随机选择的点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns two randomly selected points from the water_level field key and the relevant values of the location tag and the level description field.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 water_level 字段键以及 location 标签和 level description 字段的相关值中返回两个随机选择的点。

trans-unit.source: The query returns values of the water_level field key that are floats.
trans-unit.target: 该查询返回 water_level 字段键的值为浮点型。

trans-unit.source: The query selects all fields and tags from the h2o_feetmeasurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量中选择所有字段和标签。

trans-unit.source: The query selects all field keys and tag keys that include an l. Note that the regular expression in the SELECT clause must match at least one field key in order to return results for a tag key that matches the regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 该查询选择所有包含 l 的字段键和标记键。请注意， SELECT 子句中的正则表达式必须至少与一个字段键匹配，以便返回与正则表达式匹配的标记键的结果。

trans-unit.source: The query selects all data from the h2o_feet measurement where the locationtag has no value. Every data point in the NOAA_water_database has a tag value for location.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量中选择 location 标记没有值的所有数据。每个数据点在 NOAA_water_database 有标签值 location 。

trans-unit.source: The query selects all fields and tags from two measurements: h2o_feet and h2o_pH. Separate multiple measurements with a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: 该查询从两个度量中选择所有字段和标签： h2o_feet 和 h2o_pH 。用逗号（ , ）分隔多个测量值。

trans-unit.source: The query selects all fields from the h2o_feet measurement. The SELECT clause supports combining the * syntax with the :: syntax.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量中选择所有字段。在 SELECT 子句支持合并 * 语法与 :: 语法。

trans-unit.source: The query selects data in the NOAA_water_database, the DEFAULT retention policy, and the h2o_feet measurement. The .. indicates the DEFAULT retention policy for the specified database.
trans-unit.target: 该查询在 NOAA_water_database ， DEFAULT 保留策略和 h2o_feet 测量中选择数据。该 .. 表示 DEFAULT 指定数据库保留策略。

trans-unit.source: The query selects data in the NOAA_water_database, the autogen retention policy, and the measurement h2o_feet.
trans-unit.target: 查询选择在数据 NOAA_water_database ，所述 autogen 保留策略和测量 h2o_feet 。

trans-unit.source: The query selects the level description field, the location tag, and the water_level field from the h2o_feet measurement. The ::[field | tag] syntax specifies if the identifier is a field or tag. Use ::[field | tag] to differentiate between an identical field key and tag key . That syntax is not required for most use cases.
trans-unit.target: 该查询从 h2o_feet 测量中选择 level description 字段， location 标签和 water_level 字段。该 ::[field | tag] [tag]语法指定标识符是字段还是标签。使用 ::[field | tag] 标签]来区分相同的字段键和标签键。大多数用例都不需要该语法。

trans-unit.source: The query selects the level description field, the location tag, and the water_level field. Note that the SELECT clause must specify at least one field when it includes a tag.
trans-unit.target: 该查询选择 level description 字段， location 标签和 water_level 字段。请注意， SELECT 子句包含标签时，必须至少指定一个字段。

trans-unit.source: The query takes the following form where you must include either the FROM clause or the WHERE clause, or both:
trans-unit.target: 该查询采用以下形式，其中您必须包括 FROM 子句或 WHERE 子句，或同时包括这两者：

trans-unit.source: The query takes the following form, where you must specify either the FROM clause or the WHERE clause:
trans-unit.target: 查询采用以下形式，您必须在其中指定 FROM 子句或 WHERE 子句：

trans-unit.source: The query takes the following form:
trans-unit.target: 查询的形式如下:

trans-unit.source: The query to execute. Must not contain a time condition in the WHERE clause or contain a GROUP BY clause. The time conditions are added dynamically according to the period, offset and schedule. The GROUP BY clause is added dynamically according to the dimensions passed to the groupBy method.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的查询。不能在 WHERE 子句中包含时间条件，也不能包含 GROUP BY 子句。时间条件是根据周期，偏移量和时间表动态添加的。的 GROUP BY 子句根据传递到尺寸动态添加 groupBy 方法。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function and a GROUP BY clause to calculate the average water_level for each tag and for each twelve-minute interval in the query’s time range. LIMIT 2 requests the two oldest twelve-minute averages (determined by timestamp).
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和GROUP BY子句来计算查询时间范围内每个标签和每个十二分钟间隔的平均 water_level 。 LIMIT 2 请求两个最早的十二分钟平均值（由时间戳确定）。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function and a time interval in the GROUP BY clause to calculate the average water_level for each twelve-minute interval in the query’s time range. LIMIT 2 requests the two oldest twelve-minute averages (determined by timestamp) and SLIMIT 1 requests a single series associated with the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和GROUP BY子句中的时间间隔来计算查询时间范围内每个十二分钟间隔的平均 water_level 。 LIMIT 2 请求两个最古老的十二分钟平均值（由时间戳确定），而 SLIMIT 1 请求一个与 h2o_feet 测量相关的序列。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function and a time interval in the GROUP BY clause to calculate the average water_level for each twelve-minute interval in the query’s time range. ORDER BY time DESC returns the most recent 12-minute time intervals first.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和GROUP BY子句中的时间间隔来计算查询时间范围内每个十二分钟间隔的平均 water_level 。 ORDER BY time DESC 首先返回最近的12分钟时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function and a time interval in the GROUP BY clause to calculate the average water_level for each twelve-minute interval in the query’s time range. SLIMIT 1 requests a single series associated with the h2o_feet measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数和GROUP BY子句中的时间间隔来计算查询时间范围内每个十二分钟间隔的平均 water_level 。 SLIMIT 1 请求与 h2o_feet 测量相关的单个序列。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average degrees for every measurement in the NOAA_water_databasedatabase that contains the word temperature.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用的InfluxQL 函数来计算平均 degrees 为每一个测量在 NOAA_water_database 数据库包含单词 temperature 。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average index for each combination of the locationtag and the randtag tag in the h2o_quality measurement. Separate multiple tags with a comma in the GROUP BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数为 h2o_quality 测量中的 location 标签和 randtag 标签的每个组合计算平均 index 。在 GROUP BY 子句中用逗号分隔多个标签。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average index for every possible tag combination in the h2o_quality measurement.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数来计算 h2o_quality 测量中每个可能的标签组合的平均 index 。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level across all data that have a tag value for location.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数来计算所有具有 location 标签值的数据的平均 water_level 。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level for all data where the field value of level description includes the word between.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数来计算所有数据的平均 water_level ，其中 level description 的字段值包括 between 的单词。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level for each tag value of location in the h2o_feetmeasurement. InfluxDB returns results in two series: one for each tag value of location.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用的InfluxQL 函数来计算平均 water_level 为每个变量值的 location 在 h2o_feet 测量。InfluxDB返回两个系列的结果：每个 location 标签值一个。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level where the tag value of location includes an m and water_level is greater than three.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用的InfluxQL 函数来计算平均 water_level ，其中标签值的 location 包括一 m 和 water_level 大于三。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level, grouping results into 12 minute time intervals, and offsetting the preset time boundaries by six minutes.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数计算平均 water_level ，将结果分组为12分钟的时间间隔，并将预设的时间范围偏移6分钟。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level, grouping results into 18 minute time intervals, and offsetting the preset time boundaries by -12 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数来计算平均 water_level ，将结果分组为18分钟的时间间隔，并将预设的时间范围偏移-12分钟。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to calculate the average water_level, grouping results into 18 minute time intervals, and offsetting the preset time boundaries by six minutes.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数计算平均 water_level ，将结果分组为18分钟的时间间隔，并将预设的时间范围偏移6分钟。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to count the number of water_level points with the taglocation = coyote_creek and it group results into 12 minute intervals.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数对标签 location = coyote_creek 的 water_level 点的数量进行计数，并将结果分为12分钟间隔。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to count the number of water_level points. It groups results by the location tag and into 12 minute intervals. Note that the time interval and the tag key are separated by a comma in the GROUP BY clause.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数来计算 water_level 点的数量。它将结果按 location 标签分组，并间隔12分钟。请注意，时间间隔和标签键在 GROUP BY 子句中用逗号分隔。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to return the distinct field values for every field key that contains the word level.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数为每个包含单词 level 字段键返回不同的字段值。

trans-unit.source: The query uses an InfluxQL function to select the first value of index for every tag that includes the letter l in its tag key.
trans-unit.target: 该查询使用InfluxQL 函数为每个在其标签键中包含字母 l 的标签选择 index 的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: The query writes its results a new measurement: h2o_feet_copy_1. If you’re using the CLI, InfluxDB writes the data to the USEd database and the DEFAULTretention policy. If you’re using the HTTP API, InfluxDB writes the data to the database and retention policy specified in the db and rpquery string parameters. If you do not set the rp query string parameter, the HTTP API automatically writes the data to the database’s DEFAULT retention policy.
trans-unit.target: 该查询将其结果写入新的度量值： h2o_feet_copy_1 。如果您使用的是CLI，则InfluxDB会将数据写入 USE d 数据库和 DEFAULT 保留策略。如果您使用的是HTTP API，则InfluxDB会将数据写入 db 和 rp 查询字符串参数中指定的数据库和保留策略。如果未设置 rp query string参数，则HTTP API会自动将数据写入数据库的 DEFAULT 保留策略。

trans-unit.source: The query writes its results to a new measurement: h2o_feet_copy_2. InfluxDB writes the data to the where_else database and to the autogen retention policy. Note that both where_else and autogen must exist prior to running the INTO query. See Database Management for how to manage databases and retetion policies.

trans-unit.source: The result is that InfluxDB is not a full CRUD database but more like a CR-ud, prioritizing the performance of creating and reading data over update and destroy, and preventing some update and destroy behaviors to make create and read more performant.
trans-unit.target: 结果是,InfluxDB不是一个完整的CRUD数据库,而更像一个CR-ud,优先考虑创建和读取数据的性能,而不是更新和销毁,并防止一些更新和销毁行为,使创建和读取的性能更高。

trans-unit.source: The six-minute offset interval shifts forward the preset boundary’s time range such that the boundary time ranges and the relevant GROUP BY time() interval time ranges are always the same. With the offset, each interval performs the calculation on three points, and the timestamp returned matches both the start of the boundary time range and the start of the GROUP BY time() interval time range.
trans-unit.target: 六分钟的偏移间隔使预设边界的时间范围向前移动，以使边界时间范围和相关的 GROUP BY time() 间隔时间范围始终相同。使用该偏移量，每个间隔在三个点上执行计算，并且返回的时间戳与边界时间范围的开始和 GROUP BY time() 间隔时间范围的开始匹配。

trans-unit.source: The six-minute offset interval shifts forward the preset boundary’s time range such that the preset boundary time range and the relevant GROUP BY time() interval time range are the same. trans-unit.source: The state count will be added as an additional field to each point. If the expression evaluates as false, the value will be -1. If the expression generates an error during evaluation, the point is discarded, and does not affect the state count.

trans-unit.source: The state duration will be added as an additional field to each point. If the expression evaluates as false, the value will be -1. If the expression generates an error during evaluation, the point is discarded, and does not affect the state duration.
trans-unit.target: 状态持续时间将作为附加字段添加到每个点。如果表达式的值为false,其值将为-1。 如果表达式在计算过程中产生错误,则该点将被丢弃,并且不影响状态持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The statistics returned by SHOW STATS are stored in memory only, and are reset to zero when the node is restarted.
trans-unit.target: SHOW STATS 返回的统计信息仅存储在内存中，并且在节点重新启动时重置为零。

trans-unit.source: The stats are in groups according to the original data. Meaning that if the source node is grouped by the tag 'host' as an example, then the counts are output per host with the appropriate 'host' tag. Since its possible for groups to change when crossing a node only the emitted groups are considered.
trans-unit.target: 统计结果是按照原始数据进行分组的。意思是说,如果源节点被标签 "host "分组,那么每个主机都会输出相应的 "host "标签的计数。由于其在穿越节点时有可能改变分组,所以只考虑发出的分组。

trans-unit.source: The status icon depends on your host’s local time in UTC. Use the Network Time Protocol (NTP) to synchronize time between hosts; if hosts’ clocks aren’t synchronized with NTP, the status icon can be inaccurate.
trans-unit.target: 状态图标取决于您所在主机的本地时间（UTC）。使用网络时间协议（NTP）同步主机之间的时间；如果主机的时钟未与NTP同步，则状态图标可能不正确。

trans-unit.source: The status icon is a high-level measure of your host’s health. If Chronograf has not received data from a host for the past minute, the status icon is red. If Chronograf has received data from a host within the past minute, the status icon is green.
trans-unit.target: 状态图标是主机健康状况的高级衡量指标。如果Chronograf在过去一分钟内未从主机接收数据，则状态图标为红色。如果Chronograf在过去一分钟内已收到来自主机的数据，则状态图标为绿色。

trans-unit.source: The status icon turns red when Chronograf has not received data from a host for the past minute. Chronograf uses data from Telegraf to perform that calculation. By default, Telegraf sends data in ten-second intervals; you can change that interval setting in Telegraf’s configuration file. If you configure the setting to an interval that’s greater than one minute, Chronograf assumes that the host is not reporting data and changes the status icon to red.
trans-unit.target: 当Chronograf过去一分钟未从主机接收数据时，状态图标将变为红色。Chronograf使用来自Telegraf的数据执行该计算。默认情况下，Telegraf每隔十秒发送一次数据；您可以在Telegraf的配置文件中更改该间隔设置。如果您将设置配置为大于一分钟的时间间隔，则Chronograf假定主机未报告数据，并将状态图标更改为红色。

trans-unit.source: The temporary cache for recently written points. To reduce the frequency with which the permanent storage files are accessed, InfluxDB caches new points in the WAL until their total size or age triggers a flush to more permanent storage. This allows for efficient batching of the writes into the TSM.
trans-unit.target: 最近写入点的临时缓存。为了减少访问永久存储文件的频率,InfluxDB会在WAL中缓存新的点,直到它们的总大小或年龄触发刷新到更永久的存储中。这样可以高效地将写入TSM的数据批量化。

trans-unit.source: The timestamps and values are compressed and stored separately using encodings dependent on the data type and its shape. Storing them independently allows timestamp encoding to be used for all timestamps, while allowing different encodings for different field types. For example, some points may be able to use run-length encoding whereas other may not.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳和值使用依赖于数据类型及其形状的编码分别进行压缩和存储。独立存储它们允许对所有时间戳使用时间戳编码,同时允许对不同的字段类型使用不同的编码。例如,一些点可能可以使用运行长度编码,而其他点可能不能。

trans-unit.source: The two biggest advantages that LevelDB had for us were high write throughput and built in compression. However, as we learned more about what people needed with time series data, we encountered a few insurmountable challenges.
trans-unit.target: LevelDB对我们来说最大的两个优势是高写入吞吐量和内置压缩。然而,随着我们对人们对时间序列数据需求的进一步了解,我们遇到了一些难以克服的挑战。

trans-unit.source: The type of shard index to use for new shards. The default is an in-memory index that is recreated at startup. A value of tsi1 will use a disk based index that supports higher cardinality datasets.
trans-unit.target: 用于新分片的分片索引的类型。默认值为启动时重新创建的内存索引。 tsi1 的值将使用支持更高基数数据集的基于磁盘的索引。

trans-unit.source: The use of mathematical operators inside of function calls is currently unsupported. Note that InfluxDB only allows functions in the SELECT clause.
trans-unit.target: 当前不支持在函数调用中使用数学运算符。请注意，InfluxDB仅允许在 SELECT 子句中使用函数。

trans-unit.source: The vast majority of writes are for data with very recent timestamps and the data is added in time ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 绝大多数的写入都是针对最近时间戳的数据,而且数据是按照时间升序添加的。

trans-unit.source: The volume of data means that the write throughput can be very high. We regularly get requests for setups than can handle hundreds of thousands of writes per second. Some larger companies will only consider systems that can handle millions of writes per second.
trans-unit.target: 数据量意味着写入吞吐量可能非常高。我们经常会收到一些设置请求,这些设置可以处理每秒数十万次的写入。一些大公司只会考虑每秒能处理数百万次写入的系统。

trans-unit.source: The workload of time series data is quite different from normal database workloads. There are a number of factors that conspire to make it very difficult to scale and remain performant:

trans-unit.source: These certificates provide cryptographic security to HTTPS requests and allow clients to verify the identity of the InfluxDB server. Wildcard certificates can be used across multiple InfluxDB instances on different servers.
trans-unit.target: 这些证书为HTTPS请求提供了加密安全性,并允许客户验证InfluxDB服务器的身份。通配符证书可以在不同服务器上的多个InfluxDB实例中使用。

trans-unit.source: These certificates provide cryptographic security to HTTPS requests and allow clients to verify the identity of the InfluxDB server. With this certificate option, every InfluxDB instance requires a unique single domain certificate.

trans-unit.source: These lambda expressions are stateful, meaning that each time they are evaluated internal state can change and will persist until the next evaluation. This may seem odd as part of an expression language but it has a powerful use case. You can define a function within the language that is essentially a online/streaming algorithm and with each call the function state is updated. For example the built-in function sigma that calculates a running mean and standard deviation and returns the number of standard deviations the current data point is away from the mean.
trans-unit.target: 这些lambda表达式是有状态的，这意味着每次对其进行评估时，内部状态都可以更改，并将持续到下一次评估。作为表达语言的一部分，这可能看起来很奇怪，但是它具有强大的用例。您可以在语言中定义一个函数，该函数本质上是一种在线/流算法，并且每次调用都会更新函数状态。例如，内置函数 sigma 计算运行平均值和标准偏差，并返回当前数据点远离平均值的标准偏差数。

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes that you’ve already downloaded and installed each component of the TICK stack (Telegraf, InfluxDB, Chronograf, and Kapacitor). To follow along, the Telegraf instance must be configured to collect data with the system statistics input plugin and write data to your InfluxDB instance. The steps below also assume that you’ve already configured your Kapacitor instance in Chronograf. The Getting Started guide offers step-by-step instructions for each of those requirements.

trans-unit.source: This guide assumes you have a working Chronograf instance that’s connected to an InfluxDB source. It uses data from Telegraf’s system statistics input plugin. See the Getting Started guide for step-by-step installation and configuration instructions.

trans-unit.source: This guide describes how to enable HTTPS with InfluxDB. Setting up HTTPS secures the communication between clients and the InfluxDB server, and, in some cases, HTTPS verifies the authenticity of the InfluxDB server to clients.
trans-unit.target: 本指南介绍了如何在InfluxDB中启用HTTPS。设置HTTPS可以保证客户机与InfluxDB服务器之间的通信安全,在某些情况下,HTTPS还可以向客户机验证InfluxDB服务器的真实性。

trans-unit.source: This guide offers general hardware recommendations for InfluxDB and addresses some frequently asked questions about hardware sizing. The recommendations are only for the Time Structured Merge tree (TSM) storage engine, the only storage engine available with InfluxDB 1.3. Users running older versions of InfluxDB with unconvertedb1 or bz1 shards may have different performance characteristics. See the InfluxDB 0.9 sizing guide for more detail.
trans-unit.target: 本指南提供了有关InfluxDB的常规硬件建议，并解决了有关硬件大小调整的一些常见问题。这些建议仅适用于时间结构合并树（ TSM ）存储引擎，这是InfluxDB 1.3可用的唯一存储引擎。运行带有未转换的 b1 或 bz1 分片的InfluxDB旧版本的用户可能具有不同的性能特征。有关更多详细信息，请参见InfluxDB 0.9调整大小指南。

trans-unit.source: This guide offers step-by-step instructions for creating a Kapacitor alert in Chronograf. By the end of this guide, you’ll have an alert rule that sends a message to an existing Slack channel whenever your idle CPU usage crosses the 80% threshold.
trans-unit.target: 本指南提供了在Chronograf中创建Kapacitor警报的分步说明。在本指南结束时，您将拥有一条警报规则，该规则将在您的空闲CPU使用率超过80％阈值时将消息发送到现有的Slack通道。

trans-unit.source: This issue affects the SingleStat and Line+Stat graph types. If a cell’s query includes more than one field key in the SELECT clause, Chronograf returns the most recent stat associated with the first field key in the SELECT clause. If you sorted the field keys in your query to rely on that behavior, it is important to note that Chronograf may change that order when it executes your query.
trans-unit.target: 此问题影响SingleStat和Line + Stat图形类型。如果一个单元格的查询包括多个领域的主要的在 SELECT 子句中，Chronograf返回与第一场键关联的最新统计 SELECT 子句。如果您对查询中的字段键进行排序以依赖该行为，则需要注意的是，Chronograf可能会在执行查询时更改该顺序。

trans-unit.source: This section controls InfluxDB’s system self-monitoring.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制InfluxDB的系统自我监控。

trans-unit.source: This section controls how Kapacitor will receive data.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制Kapacitor如何接收数据。

trans-unit.source: This section controls how continuous queries (CQs) run within InfluxDB. CQs are automated batches of queries that execute over recent time intervals. InfluxDB executes one auto-generated query per GROUP BY time() interval.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制InfluxDB中连续查询（CQ）的运行方式。CQ是在最近时间间隔内执行的自动查询批处理。InfluxDB每个 GROUP BY time() 间隔执行一个自动生成的查询。

trans-unit.source: This section controls how InfluxDB configures the HTTP endpoints. These are the primary mechanisms for getting data into and out of InfluxDB. Edit the options in this section to enable HTTPS and authentication. See Authentication and Authorization.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制InfluxDB如何配置HTTP端点。这些是将数据传入和传出InfluxDB的主要机制。编辑此部分中的选项以启用HTTPS和身份验证。请参阅身份验证和授权。

trans-unit.source: This section controls one or many listeners for Graphite data. See the README on GitHub for more information.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制一个或多个Graphite数据的侦听器。有关更多信息，请参见GitHub上的README。

trans-unit.source: This section controls parameters for InfluxDB’s metastore, which stores information on users, databases, retention policies, shards, and continuous queries.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制InfluxDB元存储的参数，该元存储存储有关用户，数据库，保留策略，分片和连续查询的信息。

trans-unit.source: This section controls the enforcement of retention policies for evicting old data.
trans-unit.target: 本节控制旧数据驱逐的保留政策的执行。

trans-unit.source: This section controls the listener for collectd data. See the README on Github for more information.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制侦听器以收集数据。有关更多信息，请参见Github上的自述文件。

trans-unit.source: This section controls the listeners for InfluxDB line protocol data via UDP. See the UDP page for more information.
trans-unit.target: 本部分通过UDP控制InfluxDB线路协议数据的侦听器。有关更多信息，请参见UDP页面。

trans-unit.source: This section controls where the actual shard data for InfluxDB lives and how it is flushed from the WAL. dir may need to be changed to a suitable place for you system, but the WAL settings are an advanced configuration. The defaults should work for most systems.
trans-unit.target: 本部分控制InfluxDB的实际分片数据在何处以及如何从WAL中清除。 dir 可能需要更改为适合您的系统的位置，但是WAL设置是高级配置。默认值适用于大多数系统。

trans-unit.source: This section covers the available tools for interacting with InfluxDB.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了与InfluxDB交互的可用工具。

trans-unit.source: This section covers the data types of Line Protocol’s major components: measurements, tag keys, tag values, field keys, field values, and timestamps.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了线路协议主要组件的数据类型：测量，标签键，标签值，字段键，字段值和时间戳。

trans-unit.source: This section covers when not to and when to double (") or single (') quote in Line Protocol. Moving from never quote to please do quote:
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍了在行协议中何时不使用以及何时将双引号（ " ）或单引号（ ' ）括起来。

trans-unit.target: 本节介绍InfluxQL，这是InfluxDB的类似于SQL的查询语言，用于与InfluxDB中的数据进行交互。
