trans-unit.target: 时间戳格式

trans-unit.source: Timestamp Syntax
trans-unit.target: 时间戳语法

trans-unit.source: Timestamp encoding is adaptive and based on the structure of the timestamps that are encoded. It uses a combination of delta encoding, scaling, and compression using simple8b run-length encoding, as well as falling back to no compression if needed.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳编码是自适应的,基于被编码的时间戳的结构。它使用三角编码、缩放和使用simple8b run-length编码压缩的组合,以及在需要时回落到不压缩。

trans-unit.source: Timestamp resolution is variable but can be as granular as a nanosecond, requiring up to 8 bytes to store uncompressed. During encoding, the values are first delta-encoded. The first value is the starting timestamp and subsequent values are the differences from the prior value. This usually converts the values into much smaller integers that are easier to compress. Many timestamps are also monotonically increasing and fall on even boundaries of time such as every 10s. When timestamps have this structure, they are scaled by the largest common divisor that is also a factor of 10. This has the effect of converting very large integer deltas into smaller ones that compress even better.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳的分辨率是可变的,但可以是纳秒级的,最多需要8个字节来存储未压缩。在编码过程中,首先对值进行三角编码。第一个值是起始时间戳,随后的值是与前一个值的差异。这通常会将值转换为更小的整数,更容易压缩。许多时间戳也是单调递增的,落在时间的偶数边界上,比如每10s一次。当时间戳具有这种结构时,它们会被最大的共同除数缩放,这个除数也是10的系数。这样做的效果是将非常大的整数三角区转换为更小的三角区,压缩得更好。

trans-unit.source: Timestamps
trans-unit.target: Timestamps

trans-unit.source: Timestamps are UNIX timestamps. The minimum valid timestamp is -9223372036854775806 or 1677-09-21T00:12:43.145224194Z. The maximum valid timestamp is 9223372036854775806 or 2262-04-11T23:47:16.854775806Z. As mentioned above, by default, InfluxDB assumes that timestamps have nanosecond precision. See the API Reference for how to specify alternative precisions.
trans-unit.target: 时间戳是UNIX时间戳。最小有效时间戳为 -9223372036854775806 或 1677-09-21T00:12:43.145224194Z 。最大有效时间戳为 9223372036854775806 或 2262-04-11T23:47:16.854775806Z 。如上所述，默认情况下，InfluxDB假定时间戳具有纳秒级的精度。有关如何指定替代精度的信息，请参见API参考。

trans-unit.source: Timestamps outside that range return a parsing error.
trans-unit.target: 超出该范围的时间戳将返回解析错误。

trans-unit.source: Timing is everything
trans-unit.target: 时机就是一切

This can be done either manually by an operator or automatically through the use of an Auth0 Rule or a pre-user registration Auth0 Hook

trans-unit.source: To calculate the values per second rate, multiply the number of points written per second by the number of values stored per point. For example, if the points have four fields each, and a batch of 5000 points is written 10 times per second, then the values per second rate is 4 field values per point * 5000 points per batch * 10 batches per second = 200,000 values per second.
trans-unit.target: 要计算每秒速率的值，请将每秒写入的点数乘以每个点存储的值数。例如，如果每个点都有四个字段，并且每秒将10个批次的5000点写入一次，则每秒速率的值是 4 field values per point * 5000 points per batch * 10 batches per second = 200,000 values per second 。

trans-unit.source: To get around doing deletes, we split data across what we call shards, which are contiguous blocks of time. Shards would typically hold either one day or seven days worth of data. Each shard mapped to an underlying LevelDB. This meant that we could drop an entire day of data by just closing out the database and removing the underlying files.
trans-unit.target: 为了绕过进行删除,我们将数据分割在我们所谓的shards上,shards是连续的时间块。Shards通常会保存一天或七天的数据。每个shard都映射到一个底层LevelDB。这意味着,我们只需关闭数据库并删除底层文件,就可以删除一整天的数据。

trans-unit.source: To get those results, InfluxDB first calculates the minimum water_levels at 12-minute intervals. The second query in the codeblock shows the results of that step. The step is the same as using the MIN() function with the GROUP BY time() clause and without the ELAPSED() function. Notice that the timestamps returned by the second query are 12 minutes apart. In the raw data, the first result (2.057) occurs at 2015-08-18T00:42:00Z but the GROUP BY time() clause overrides that original timestamp. Because the timestamps are determined by the GROUP BY time() interval and not by the original data, the ELAPSED() calculation always returns the same value as the GROUP BY time() interval.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得这些结果，InfluxDB首先以12分钟为间隔计算最小 water_level 。代码块中的第二个查询显示了该步骤的结果。该步骤与将 MIN() 函数与 GROUP BY time() 子句一起使用而没有 ELAPSED() 函数的步骤相同。请注意，第二个查询返回的时间戳相隔12分钟。在原始数据中，第一个结果（ 2.057 ）发生在 2015-08-18T00:42:00Z ,但是 GROUP BY time() 子句覆盖了原始时间戳。因为时间戳是由 GROUP BY time() 间隔而不是原始数据确定的，所以 ELAPSED() 计算总是返回与 GROUP BY time() 间隔相同的值。

trans-unit.source: To keep our anomaly detection algorithm simple, let’s compute a p-value for each window of data we receive, and then emit a single data point with that p-value. To compute the p-value, we will use Welch’s t-test. For a null hypothesis, we will state that a new window is from the same population as the historical windows. If the p-value drops low enough, we can reject the null hypothesis and conclude that the window must be from something different than the historical data population, or an anomaly. This is an oversimplified approach, but we are learning how to write UDFs, not statistics.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化我们的异常检测算法，让我们为接收到的每个数据窗口计算一个 p-value ，然后发出带有该 p-value 的单个数据点。为了计算 p-value ，我们将使用Welch的t检验。对于零假设，我们将声明一个新窗口来自与历史窗口相同的总体。如果 p-value 下降得足够低，我们可以拒绝原假设，并得出结论，该窗口一定来自与历史数据总体不同的东西，或者来自异常。这是一种过于简化的方法，但是我们正在学习如何编写UDF，而不是统计信息。

trans-unit.source: Updates
trans-unit.target: Updates

trans-unit.source: Updates (writing a newer value for a point that already exists) occur as normal writes. Since cached values overwrite existing values, newer writes take precedence. If a write would overwrite a point in a prior TSM file, the points are merged at query runtime and the newer write takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 更新(为一个已经存在的点写入一个更新的值)就像正常的写入一样。由于缓存的值会覆盖现有的值,所以较新的写入会优先。如果写入会覆盖之前TSM文件中的一个点,那么在查询运行时,这些点会被合并,而较新的写入会优先。

trans-unit.source: Updates to existing data are a rare occurrence and contentious updates never happen. Time series data is predominantly new data that is never updated.
trans-unit.target: 对现有数据的更新是极少数,有争议的更新从未发生。时间序列数据主要是从不更新的新数据。

trans-unit.source: Usage Instructions
trans-unit.target: 使用说明

trans-unit.source: Usage:
trans-unit.target: Usage:

trans-unit.source: Use now() to query data with timestamps relative to the server’s current timestamp.
trans-unit.target: 使用 now() 来查询数据与时间戳相对于服务器的当前时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Use /debug/requests/ to track HTTP client requests to the /write and /query endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 使用 /debug/requests/ 跟踪对 /write 和 /query 端点的HTTP客户端请求。

trans-unit.source: Use /ping to check the status of your InfluxDB instance and your version of InfluxDB.
trans-unit.target: 使用 /ping 检查您的InfluxDB实例的状态和您的InfluxDB版本。

trans-unit.source: Use /query to query data and manage databases, retention policies, and users.
trans-unit.target: 使用 /query 查询数据并管理数据库，保留策略和用户。

trans-unit.source: Use /write to write data to a pre-existing database.
trans-unit.target: 使用 /write 将数据写入到预先存在的数据库。

trans-unit.source: Use HOLT_WINTERS() to:
trans-unit.target: 使用 HOLT_WINTERS() 可以：

trans-unit.source: Use CQs with InfluxDB’s retention policies (RPs) to mitigate storage concerns. Combine CQs and RPs to automatically downsample high precision data to a lower precision and remove the dispensable, high precision data from the database.
trans-unit.target: 将CQ与InfluxDB的保留策略（RP）结合使用，可以减轻存储问题。结合CQ和RP，可以自动将高精度数据降采样为较低精度，并从数据库中删除可分配的高精度数据。

trans-unit.source: Use Chronograf’s Admin page to modify the retention policy in the chronograf database. In the Databases tab:
trans-unit.target: 使用Chronograf的“管理”页面修改 chronograf 数据库中的保留策略。在数据库选项卡中：

trans-unit.source: Use Chronograf’s dashboard template variables to interact with your dashboard cells and explore your data. Template variables allow you to alter specific components of a cell’s query without having to navigate away from the dashboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用Chronograf的仪表板模板变量与您的仪表板单元进行交互并浏览数据。模板变量使您可以更改单元格查询的特定组成部分，而不必离开仪表板。

trans-unit.source: Use Go (golang) 1.8.1.
trans-unit.target: 使用Go(golang)1.8.1。

trans-unit.source: Use RFC3339 timestamps in log output.
trans-unit.target: 在日志输出中使用RFC3339时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Use X-Forwarded-For IP address in HTTP logger if present.
trans-unit.target: 在HTTP记录器中使用X-Forwarded-For IP地址,如果存在。

trans-unit.source: Use a FOR interval and fill() to change the value reported for time intervals with no data. Note that at least one data point must fall within the FOR interval for fill() to operate. If no data fall within the FOR interval the CQ writes no points to the destination measurement.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FOR interval和 fill() 可以更改没有数据的时间间隔的报告值。请注意，至少一个数据点必须在 FOR 间隔内才能使 fill() 运行。如果没有数据落在 FOR 间隔内，则CQ不会将任何点写入目标测量值。

trans-unit.source: Use a FOR interval in the RESAMPLE clause to specify the length of the CQ’s time range.
trans-unit.target: 在 RESAMPLE 子句中使用 FOR 间隔来指定CQ的时间范围的长度。

trans-unit.source: Use a comma instead of a space between the measurement and tag to avoid the error:
trans-unit.target: 在测量和标签之间使用逗号代替空格,以避免错误。

trans-unit.source: Use a comma instead of a space between the two fields to avoid the error:
trans-unit.target: 使用逗号代替两个字段之间的空格,以避免错误。

trans-unit.source: Use a function with a wildcard (*) and INTO query’s backreferencing syntax to automatically downsample data from all measurements and numerical fields in a database.
trans-unit.target: 使用带通配符（ * ）的函数和 INTO 查询的反向引用语法可自动对数据库中所有度量值和数字字段中的数据进行降采样。

trans-unit.source: Use a simple CQ to automatically downsample data from a single field and write the results to another measurement in the same database.
trans-unit.target: 使用简单的CQ从单个字段自动下采样数据,并将结果写入同一数据库中的另一个测量。

trans-unit.source: Use an offset interval in the GROUP BY time() clause to alter both the CQ’s default execution time and preset time boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 在 GROUP BY time() 子句中使用偏移间隔来更改CQ的默认执行时间和预设时间边界。

trans-unit.source: Use an EVERY interval and FOR interval in the RESAMPLE clause to specify the CQ’s execution interval and the length of the CQ’s time range.
trans-unit.target: 在 RESAMPLE 子句中使用 EVERY 间隔和 FOR 间隔来指定CQ的执行间隔和CQ的时间范围的长度。

trans-unit.source: Use an EVERY interval in the RESAMPLE clause to specify the CQ’s execution interval.
trans-unit.target: 在 RESAMPLE 子句中使用 EVERY 间隔来指定CQ的执行间隔。

trans-unit.source: Use comments with InfluxQL statements to describe your queries.
trans-unit.target: 使用InfluxQL语句的注释来描述你的查询。

trans-unit.source: Use consistent column output from the CLI for column formatted responses.
trans-unit.target: 从CLI中使用一致的列输出进行列格式化的响应。

trans-unit.source: Use for all queries that start with: ALTERCREATEDELETEDROPGRANTKILLREVOKE
trans-unit.target: 用于所有以以下开头的查询： ALTER CREATE DELETE DROP GRANT KILL REVOKE

trans-unit.source: Use for all queries that start with: SELECT* SHOW
trans-unit.target: 用于所有以下列开头的查询： SELECT * SHOW

trans-unit.source: Use group by time when your period is longer than your group by time interval.
trans-unit.target: 当您的经期比您的组别时间间隔长时,请使用按时间分组。

trans-unit.source: Use milliseconds in the InfluxDB dashboard instead of nanoseconds
trans-unit.target: 在InfluxDB仪表板中使用毫秒而不是纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Use own client for improved through-put and less allocations in the InfluxDB output plugin.
trans-unit.target: 使用自己的客户端提高吞吐量，并减少InfluxDB输出插件中的分配。

trans-unit.source: Use task templates to reduce the amount of TICKscripts you need to write.
trans-unit.target: 使用任务模板来减少您需要编写的TICKscripts数量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CREATE CONTINUOUS QUERY statement to generate a CQ:
trans-unit.target: 使用 CREATE CONTINUOUS QUERY 语句生成CQ：

trans-unit.source: Use the CREATE RETENTION POLICY statement to create a DEFAULT RP:
trans-unit.target: 使用 CREATE RETENTION POLICY 语句创建 DEFAULT RP：

trans-unit.source: Use the CREATE RETENTION POLICY statement to create a non-DEFAULT RP:
trans-unit.target: 使用 CREATE RETENTION POLICY 语句创建非 DEFAULT RP：

trans-unit.source: Use the CLI to write a point to the NOAA_water_database that occurs after now():
trans-unit.target: 使用CLI将点写入到 now() 之后的 NOAA_water_database 中：

trans-unit.source: Use the :: syntax to specify if the key is a field key or tag key.
trans-unit.target: 使用 :: 语法来指定键是字段键还是标签键。

trans-unit.source: Use the HTTP API to specify timestamps with a precision other than nanoseconds, such as microseconds, milliseconds, or seconds. We recommend using the coarsest precision possible as this can result in significant improvements in compression. See the API Reference for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用HTTP API以非纳秒（例如，微秒，毫秒或秒）的精度指定时间戳。我们建议尽可能使用最粗略的精度，因为这可以显着提高压缩率。有关更多信息，请参见API参考。

trans-unit.source: Use the Network Time Protocol (NTP) to synchronize time between hosts. InfluxDB uses a host’s local time in UTC to assign timestamps to data; if hosts’ clocks aren’t synchronized with NTP, the timestamps on the data written to InfluxDB can be inaccurate.
trans-unit.target: 使用网络时间协议（NTP）在主机之间同步时间。InfluxDB使用UTC中主机的本地时间为数据分配时间戳。如果主机的时钟未与NTP同步，则写入InfluxDB的数据上的时间戳可能不准确。

trans-unit.source: Use the coarsest precision possible for timestamps. This can result in significant improvements in compression.
trans-unit.target: 使用粗精度的时间戳可能。这可以显着改善压缩效果。

trans-unit.source: Use the syntax INSERT INTO [<database>.]<retention_policy> <line_protocol> to write data to a non-DEFAULT retention policy using the CLI. (Specifying the database and retention policy this way is only allowed with the CLI. Writes over HTTP must specify the database and optionally the retention policy with the db and rp query parameters.)
trans-unit.target: 使用语法 INSERT INTO [<database>.]<retention_policy> <line_protocol> 可以使用CLI 将数据写入非 DEFAULT 保留策略。（只有CLI才允许以这种方式指定数据库和保留策略。通过HTTP写入必须指定数据库，并且还可以指定具有 db 和 rp 查询参数的保留策略。）

trans-unit.source: Use the time of the selected point instead of the time of the batch.

trans-unit.source: Users of RocksDB may at this point bring up a feature called ColumnFamilies. When putting time series data into Rocks, it’s common to split blocks of time into column families and then drop those when their time is up. It’s the same general idea: create a separate area where you can just drop files instead of updating indexes when you delete a large block of data. Dropping a column family is a very efficient operation. However, column families are a fairly new feature and we had another use case for shards.
trans-unit.target: RocksDB的用户此时可能会调用一项称为ColumnFamilies的功能。将时间序列数据放入Rocks时，通常将时间块划分为列族，然后在时间到时将其删除。这是相同的基本思想：创建一个单独的区域，在删除大块数据时，您可以仅删除文件而不是更新索引。删除列族是非常有效的操作。但是，列族是一个相当新的功能，我们还有另一个分片用例。

trans-unit.source: Users of the windows ping plugin will need to drop or migrate their measurements to continue using the plugin. The reason for this is that the windows plugin was outputting a different type than the linux plugin. This made it impossible to use the ping plugin for both windows and linux machines.
trans-unit.target: Windows Ping插件的用户将需要删除或迁移其测量值才能继续使用该插件。原因是Windows插件输出的类型不同于linux插件。这使得无法在Windows和Linux计算机上使用 ping 插件。

trans-unit.source: Using DISTINCT() with the INTO clause can cause InfluxDB to overwrite points in the destination measurement. DISTINCT() often returns several results with the same timestamp; InfluxDB assumes points with the same series and timestamp are duplicate points and simply overwrites any duplicate point with the most recent point in the destination measurement.
trans-unit.target: 在 INTO 子句中使用 DISTINCT() 可能导致InfluxDB覆盖目标度量中的点。 DISTINCT() 通常返回带有相同时间戳的多个结果。InfluxDB假设点与同系列和时间戳是重复点和简单的覆盖与目的测量最近点的任何重复点。

trans-unit.source: Using a combination of RPs and CQs, we’ve successfully set up our database to automatically keep the high precision raw data for a limited time, create lower precision data, and store that lower precision data for a longer period of time. Now that you have a general understanding of how these features can work together, we recommend looking at the detailed documentation on CQs and RPs to see all that they can do for you.
trans-unit.target: 通过结合使用RP和CQ，我们成功地建立了数据库以在有限的时间内自动保留高精度的原始数据，创建较低精度的数据，并将该较低精度的数据存储更长的时间。现在，您已经对这些功能如何协同工作有了大致的了解，我们建议您查看有关CQ和RP的详细文档，以了解它们可以为您做的一切。

trans-unit.source: Using a process UDF can be simpler than a socket UDF because Kapacitor will spawn the process and manage everything for you. On the other hand you may want more control over the UDF process itself and rather expose only a socket to Kapacitor. One use case that is common is running Kapacitor in a Docker container and the UDF in another container that exposes the socket via a Docker volume.
trans-unit.target: 使用进程UDF比使用套接字UDF更简单,因为Kapacitor会生成进程并为你管理一切。另一方面,你可能希望对UDF进程本身有更多的控制,而只需要向Kapacitor暴露一个socket。一个常见的用例是在一个Docker容器中运行Kapacitor,而UDF在另一个容器中通过Docker卷暴露socket。

trans-unit.source: Using these adjusted values, if all the deltas are the same, the time range is stored using run-length encoding. If run-length encoding is not possible and all values are less than (1 << 60) - 1 (~36.5 years at nanosecond resolution), then the timestamps are encoded using simple8b encoding. Simple8b encoding is a 64bit word-aligned integer encoding that packs multiple integers into a single 64bit word. If any value exceeds the maximum the deltas are stored uncompressed using 8 bytes each for the block. Future encodings may use a patched scheme such as Patched Frame-Of-Reference (PFOR) to handle outliers more effectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些调整后的值，如果所有增量都相同，则使用行程编码来存储时间范围。如果无法进行行程编码并且所有值均小于（1 << 60）-1（纳秒分辨率约为36 .5 年），则使用simple8b编码对时间戳进行编码。 Simple8b编码是一种64位字对齐的整数编码，它将多个整数打包到单个64位字中。如果有任何值超过最大值，则增量将不压缩地存储，每个块使用8个字节。将来的编码可能会使用修补方案，例如修补参考框架（PFOR），以更有效地处理离群值。

trans-unit.source: Vars work with normal tasks as well and can be used to overwrite any defaults in the script. Since at any point a TICKscript could come in handy as a template we recommend always using var declarations in your scripts. This way your normal tasks work and if you decide that you want to create another similar task its now trivial to define a template and then multiple tasks.
trans-unit.target: Var也可以处理正常任务，并且可以用来覆盖脚本中的所有默认值。由于在任何时候都可以将TICKscript作为模板使用，因此我们建议始终在脚本中使用 var 声明。这样，您的常规任务便可以正常工作，并且如果您决定要创建另一个类似的任务，现在就很容易定义一个模板，然后再定义多个任务。

trans-unit.source: We are done, future alerts triggered by the cpu_alert task will be send to Slack via the cpu topic.

trans-unit.source: We are going to demonstrate how to setup a cpu alert topic and send alerts to that topic.
trans-unit.target: 我们将演示如何设置 cpu 警报主题并将警报发送到该主题。

trans-unit.source: We are selecting the first value that occurs every hour but we also want to retrieve the host associated with that point. Since the Point types only specify a single typed Value for efficiency, we push the host into the auxiliary fields of the point. These auxiliary fields are attached to the point until it is passed to the emitter where the fields get split off to their own iterator.
trans-unit.target: 我们选择的是每小时发生的第一个 value ，但我们也想检索与该点关联的 host 。由于 Point 类型只为效率指定了一个类型化的 Value ，因此我们将 host 推入Point的辅助字段中。这些辅助字段将附加到该点，直到将其传递到发射器为止，在该发射器中，这些字段将拆分为它们自己的迭代器。

trans-unit.source: We can also create a task for a memory based alert, using the same template. Create a mem_vars.json and use this snippet.
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以使用相同的模板为基于内存的警报创建任务。创建一个 mem_vars.json 并使用此代码段。

trans-unit.source: We can confirm there are no handlers by checking the topic:

trans-unit.source: We can verify it worked by listing information about the recording. Our recording came out to 1.6MB, so yours should come out somewhere close to that:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以通过列出有关记录的信息来验证它是否有效。我们的记录输出为 1.6MB ，因此您的记录应该接近该位置：

trans-unit.source: We define the load that you’ll be placing on InfluxDB by the number of fields written per second, the number of queries per second, and the number of unique series. Based on your load, we make general CPU, RAM, and IOPS recommendations.
trans-unit.target: 我们通过每秒写入的字段数，每秒查询的数量以及唯一序列的数量来定义您将要加在InfluxDB上的负载。根据您的负载，我们提出一般的CPU，RAM和IOPS建议。

trans-unit.source: We first wrote a node in the pipeline package (filepath: pipeline/housedb_out.go) to define the TICKscript API for sending data to a HouseDB instance. We then wrote the implementation of that node in the kapacitor package (filepath: housedb_out.go). We also updated pipeline/node.go to add a new chaining method and task.go to associate the two types.
trans-unit.target: 我们首先在 pipeline 程序包（文件路径： pipeline/housedb_out.go ）中编写了一个节点，以定义用于将数据发送到HouseDB实例的TICKscript API。然后，我们在 kapacitor 包（文件路径： housedb_out.go ）中编写了该节点的实现。我们还更新了 pipeline/node.go 以添加新的链接方法，并添加 task.go 来关联这两种类型。

trans-unit.source: We have now defined all the necessary pieces so that TICKscripts can define HouseDBOutNodes:
trans-unit.target: 我们现在已经定义了所有必要的部分,所以TICKscripts可以定义HouseDBOutNodes。

trans-unit.source: We highly recommend moving to the open source Chronograf product. It’s pretty great, we promise! Check out the Getting Started guide to get up and running!
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议您使用开源Chronograf产品。我们保证，这太好了！查看《入门指南》以启动并运行！

trans-unit.source: We list possible workarounds for changing a field’s data type below. Note that these workarounds will not update data that have already been written to the database.
trans-unit.target: 我们在下面列出了更改字段数据类型的可能解决方法。请注意，这些变通办法不会更新已经写入数据库的数据。

trans-unit.source: We need to build a leaderboard so spectators can see the player’s scores in real time. We would also like to have historical data on leaders in order to do post game analysis on who was leading for how long etc.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要建立一个排行榜，以便观众实时查看玩家的得分。我们还希望拥有有关领导者的历史数据，以便对谁领导了多久等进行了赛后分析。

trans-unit.source: We need to query the two measurements, errors and views.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要查询两个度量， errors 和 views 。

trans-unit.source: We need to write a program that starts up and listens on a socket. The following code is a main function that listens on a socket at a default path, or on a custom path specified as the -socket flag.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要编写一个启动并在套接字上侦听的程序。以下代码是一个主要函数，该函数在默认路径或指定为 -socket 标志的自定义路径上侦听套接字。

trans-unit.source: We perform the following steps before writing the data to the database food_data. We do this before inserting any data because CQs only run against recent data; that is, data with timestamps that are no older than now() minus the FOR clause of the CQ, or now() minus the GROUP BY time() interval if the CQ has no FOR clause.
trans-unit.target: 在将数据写入数据库 food_data 之前，我们执行以下步骤。我们在插入任何数据之前先执行此操作，因为CQ仅针对最新数据运行；也就是说，时间戳的数据不早于 now() 减去CQ 的 FOR 子句，或者 now() 减去 GROUP BY time() 间隔（如果CQ没有 FOR 子句）。

trans-unit.source: We recommend configuring the shard group duration such that:
trans-unit.target: 我们建议配置碎片组的持续时间,这样:

trans-unit.source: We recommend implementing on-disk encryption; InfluxDB does not offer built-in support to encrypt the data.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议实施磁盘加密,InfluxDB不提供内置的数据加密支持。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using HTTPS with Chronograf. If you are not using a TLS termination proxy, you can run Chronograf’s server with TLS connections.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议将HTTPS与Chronograf一起使用。如果您不使用TLS终止代理，则可以使用TLS连接运行Chronograf的服务器。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using two SSD volumes. One for the influxdb/wal and one for the influxdb/data. Depending on your load each volume should have around 1k-3k provisioned IOPS. The influxdb/data volume should have more disk space with lower IOPS and the influxdb/wal volume should have less disk space with higher IOPS.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用两个SSD卷。一种用于 influxdb/wal ，一种用于 influxdb/data 。根据您的负载，每个卷应具有大约1k-3k的预配置IOPS。所述 influxdb/data 量应具有较低的IOPS和更多的磁盘空间 influxdb/wal 体积应具有较高的IOPS的磁盘空间更少。

trans-unit.source: We recommend visiting the Downsampling and Data Retention guide to see how to combine two InfluxDB features, CQs and retention policies, to periodically downsample data and automatically expire the dispensable high precision data.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议访问“下采样和数据保留”指南，以了解如何结合使用两个InfluxDB功能，CQ和保留策略，以定期对数据进行下采样并自动使可分配的高精度数据过期。

trans-unit.source: We recommend writing points in batches of 5,000 to 10,000 points. Smaller batches, and more HTTP requests, will result in sub-optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议以5,000到10,000点的批量写入点数。更小的批次,以及更多的HTTP请求,将导致次优的性能。

trans-unit.source: We released versions 0.9.0 to 0.9.2 based on BoltDB. From a development perspective it was delightful. Clean API, fast and easy to build in our Go project, and reliable. However, after running for a while we found a big problem with write throughput. After the database got over a few GB, writes would start spiking IOPS.
trans-unit.target: 我们发布了基于BoltDB的0.9.0到0.9.2版本。从开发的角度来看,这是令人欣喜的。干净的API,在我们的Go项目中快速方便的构建,而且可靠。但是,运行一段时间后,我们发现写吞吐量有很大问题。当数据库超过几GB之后,写入会开始飙升IOPS。

trans-unit.source: We want to know the percent of page views that resulted in an error. The process is to select both existing measurements join them and calculate the percentage. Then to store the data back into InfluxDB as a new measurement.
trans-unit.target: 我们想知道导致错误的页面浏览量的百分比。其过程是选择两个现有的测量值加入它们并计算出百分比。然后将数据作为一个新的测量值存储回InfluxDB中。

trans-unit.source: We were willing to take a hit on write throughput if it meant that we’d have a system that was more reliable and stable that we could build on. Our reasoning was that for anyone pushing really big write loads, they’d be running a cluster anyway.
trans-unit.target: 如果这意味着我们拥有一个可以构建的更可靠，更稳定的系统，那么我们愿意在写入吞吐量上大打折扣。我们的理由是，对于任何需要处理大量写入负载的人，无论如何他们都将运行集群。

trans-unit.source: We will also ask you to sign our CLA which can be found here
trans-unit.target: 我们还将要求您签署我们的CLA，可在此处找到

trans-unit.source: We will use Kapacitor’s stream processing to do the heavy lifting for us. The game servers can send a UDP packet anytime a player’s score changes or at least every 10 seconds if the score hasn’t changed.
trans-unit.target: 我们将使用Kapacitor的流处理为我们完成繁重的工作。游戏服务器可以在玩家的分数变化时随时发送UDP数据包，如果分数没有变化，则至少每10秒发送一次。

trans-unit.source: We’ll continue to fix bugs on the 1.x versions of the line protocol, query API, and TSM storage format. Users should expect to upgrade to the latest 1.x.x release for bug fixes, but those releases will all be compatible with the 1.0 API and won’t require data migrations. For instance, if a user is running 1.1 and there are bug fixes released in 1.2, they should upgrade to the 1.2 release. Until 1.3 is released, patch fixes will go into 1.2.x. Because all future 1.x releases are drop in replacements for previous 1.x releases, users should upgrade to the latest in the 1.x line to get all bug fixes.
trans-unit.target: 我们将继续修复1.x版本的线路协议，查询API和TSM存储格式上的错误。用户应该期望升级到最新的1.xx版本以修复错误，但是这些版本都将与1.0 API兼容，并且不需要数据迁移。例如，如果用户正在运行1.1，并且在1.2中发布了错误修复程序，则他们应该升级到1.2版本。在1.3版发布之前，补丁修复将进入1.2.x。因为所有将来的1.x版本都将替换以前的1.x版本，所以用户应升级到1.x版本中的最新版本以获取所有错误修复。

trans-unit.source: We’ll dig into each of these parts of the storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 我们将深入研究存储引擎的每个部分。

trans-unit.source: We’ve seen the best performance with the R4 class of machines, as they provide more memory than either of the C3/C4 class and the M4 class.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经看到R4类机器的最佳性能，因为它们比C3 / C4类和M4类提供更多的内存。
